title: Phil Westcott Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Phil Westcott? Check out all of Phil Westcott's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogPhil Westcott Phil Westcott Phil Westcott is the co-founder and CEO of Filament AI. Founded in 2016, Filament is a 50-person strong AI consultancy and software delivery firm based in the UK and Canada, specializing in deriving intelligence from unstructured data. Before Filament, Phil ran the IBM Watson partnership platform in Europe, led their Smarter Cities business in South East Asia, and launched IBM’s global IoT practice. He is a regular speaker on the convergence of AI tech, entrepreneurship, and investment. He is an entrepreneur-in-residence at the University of Nottingham, a Chartered Engineer, and holds an MBA from IESE and Columbia Business School. Phil is married with 3 children and lives in Wimbledon in southwest London. Show more Stock Intelligence Private Equity Data Analytics in Sync: A Case Study Asset Research by Phil Westcott 4 Min.
